water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Xishui county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

sentences.english: The python loves water, swimming or lying in it to rest or to hunt.
sentences.chinese: 南非蟒習水，喜歡在水中游動覓食或靜臥於水中休息。
